Parameter.Name: Execute Solver
Parameter.Whatis: The ElmerSolver executes this specific solver at times specified by this solver. Default value is to execute 'Always' meaning at every coupled iteration step.
Parameter.StatusTip: Change when this solver is executed.

Parameter.Name: Density
Parameter.Whatis: Density value may be entered here. Some models, like the ideal gas model compute density internally. In such case this value may not be necessery.

Parameter.Name: Heat Capacity
Parameter.Whatis: Specific heat capacity value may be entered here.
Parameter.StatusTip: Set value to specific heat capacity

Parameter.Name: Specific Heat Ratio
Parameter.Whatis: The ratio of specific heats (in constant pressure versus in constant volume) may be given with this keyword. The default value of this setting is 5/3, which is the appropriate value for monoatomic ideal gas.

Parameter.Name: Reference Temperature
Parameter.Whatis: Reference temperature value for various situations.

Parameter.Name: Reference Pressure
Parameter.Whatis: Reference pressure for compressible flow computations.

Parameter.Name: Heat expansion Coeff.
Parameter.StatusTip: Set value to heat expansion coefficient.
